film.title: Need for Speed
film.date: 14th of March 2014/15th of March 2014/16th of March 2014
film.description: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

film.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
film.date: 2th of March 2014/3th of March 2014/4th of March 2014
film.description: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

film.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
film.date: 14th of March 2014/15th of March 2014/16th of March 2014
film.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
